body:
The file was working just fine before, however upon reopening the file I get this error on the radiation analysis component.



1. Solution exception:NoneType is not iterable



Although the geometry transformation of the script is not working the way I want to yet. 



But the idea behind this is that I am trying to transform the negative space of a lane way to optimize solar radiation on specific faces. 



It is still a work in Progress. 



I have attached both the gh file. I have also tried this in both the current and past versions of ladybug. 



Any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body: Hi GB, Can you please internalize the geometries so I can check what's going wrong with your analysis? There is no way that I can tell you what's is wrong without having your geometry. -Mostapha

Hi Mostapha,  Uploaded are the new files with the internalized data. 

The input is just a network of a few crvs however could just be a simple single line. 

Thank you for your help.
Hi Again GB, Sorry for the late reply. You are using some components in your definition that I don't have installed. I will try again later today with more plugins installed and will let you know.
